review: Sudah ke 4 kali menginap disini, pelayanan ramah, shuttle siap mengantar ke USS, vivo city dan orcard setiap 30 menit makanannya juga oke, hotel nuansa alam.

Salah satu hotel terbaik di Singapura. Sy terkejut bisa menikmati fasilitas hotel yg menyatu dengan alam. Bs melihat burung merak langsung dari balkon kamar. Kamar begitu mewah. Breakfast luar biasa. Itu wajib dan jangan di lewati. Kolam renang besar dan ada akses langsung ke pantai. Great hotel!
Tempatnya nyaman dan fasilitasnya juga lengkap termasuk shuttle untuk uss atau ke vivo city.

Tempatnya bagus dan nyaman ada fasilitas shuttle bus untuk ke wisata sentosa, Vivo city dan ke Paragon dan pelayan baik hanya saja selama 5 hari menginap sarapannya terkesan hanya itu itu saja tapi overall bagus
Tenang dan nyaman untuk istirahat dan berolahraga.
Saya pikir seluruh pelayanan dengan standar yang biasa saja seperti hotel2 lainnya, thank

Waktu Check-In: 3 sore. Saya tiba di resor pada pukul 15:30, melihat antrian panjang orang di resepsi dan berpikir itu untuk mereka yang check out. Tetapi saya terkejut mengetahui bahwa itu untuk check-in. Antri selama 20 menit dan menyerah, jadi kami bertanya berapa lama kami harus menunggu karena antrian yang saya masuki saat ini, ditahan oleh pasangan pertama dalam antrian . Berhasil mendapatkan perhatian dari salah satu resepsionis mereka, diberi tahu kami bahwa dia akan dapat memeriksa kami terlebih dahulu tetapi kamarnya belum siap. Saya baik-baik saja dengan itu pada awalnya, mengatakan kepadanya bahwa saya hanya akan berkeliaran di resor untuk menunggu. Kembali padanya jam 4.45 sore, kamarnya masih belum siap. Memberitahunya sebelumnya bahwa kami memiliki reservasi makan malam pada jam 5 sore, dia berkata bahwa kami bisa pergi makan malam dulu. Syukurlah kami bisa menaruh barang bawaan kami di tempat penyimpanan mereka. Di tengah makan malam, menerima telepon sekitar pukul 17.30 bahwa kamar saya sudah siap untuk diambil. Itu seperti 2 jam setelah saya tiba. Mungkin mereka pendek, tetapi saya tidak berpikir bahwa para tamu harus bertanggung jawab karena kami harus menunggu selama 2 jam hanya untuk kamar kami yang akan diberikan kepada kami. * Resor ini berada di tengah area pantai, tidak ada pusat perbelanjaan dll, kita tidak bisa begitu saja meletakkan barang-barang mereka di resor dan pergi ke tempat lain dengan mudah. Selain itu, kami tidak mengenakan pakaian yang sesuai ketika kami meninggalkan barang-barang kami dengan resor dengan asumsi bahwa kami akan mendapatkan kamar kami sebelum jam 5 sore * Kembali sekitar jam 19:30, mengambil kunci kami dan diberitahu bahwa barang bawaan kami akan dikirimkan sekarang. Tebak apa? Dan saya bahkan tidak terkejut sama sekali karena kami menunggu selama 45 menit untuk menerima barang kami. Kami tinggal di kamar selama 45 menit hanya untuk mengambil barang bawaan kami. Menelepon resepsionis 5 kali untuk meminta air kemasan karena hari itu lembab sehingga kami menghabiskan air yang disediakan. Tidak ada jawaban sama sekali. Saya pasti tidak akan kembali ke resor ini untuk menginap lagi. Satu hal yang pasti untuk Julia, resepsionis, dia adalah wanita yang sangat sabar dan baik hati membantu kami meskipun harus berjalan naik turun tanpa henti selama proses check-in.
Di sini untuk bulan madu saya. Berharap mereka memiliki beberapa angsa di tempat tidur setelah kedatangan mengetahui kami sedang berbulan madu! Ha ha. Ruangan itu mewah dan luas. Tetap bagus.

Staycay ulang tahun sangat mengagumkan! Resor ini bahkan memberi kami kue gratis untuk merayakan ulang tahun pernikahan kami :) Ruangan itu luas, bersih, dan nyaman. Makan malam di tebing dan sarapan di hotel sangat luar biasa dan lezat! Kolam itu luas dan terutama kedalaman 2,5 m! Pasti akan kembali lagi!

Resor yang bagus, staf pendukung yang luar biasa (terima kasih Pak Steven), sarapan yang luar biasa. Tebingnya luar biasa. Hanya berharap mereka bisa membuka kolam air panas dan jacuzzi untuk tamu hotel. Saya telah memesan kunjungan saya berikutnya selama ulang tahun saya di bulan Mei tahun ini. Sangat berharap untuk mendapatkan pengalaman yang sama atau lebih baik.
Nice rooms, hotel provided complimentary b'day cake.

Took resort shuttle bus in from Harbourfront Exit D. As room was not yet ready at 1pm, staff suggested that we had lunch at Cliff first while waiting as part of the hotel's package. Lunch was a awesome 2-course menu with great service! Dinner was buffet at Kwee Zen and in contrast was very forgettable. Did not even serve laksa/fried rice/nasi lemak, just mostly fried items and seems cheap, machine coffee is chargeable. Breakfast next day was much better in terms of variety. Besides the dinner, the room was great, the bed was super comfortable and we enjoyed our time!

Amazing and enjoyable stay with good service and good food. We stayed 2 nights with the full board package, having 2 meals at the Cliff, 2 meals and breakfast at Kwee Zeen. We arrived slightly before before 2pm, and were allowed to check in early, and were in fact upgraded to a luxury garden room. Every meal that we had was good, with all staff being very polite and helpful. A special shout-out to Jason, a staff at the Cliff, who complemented the amazing food (best Italian food we've had in Singapore) with great service, to give us an exemplary dining experience. Overall, a 10 out of 10 experience. Definitely will return for another staycation one day.

Free upgrade to garden view room. Clean bathtub and separate shower with strong water flow! We booked the infinite dining package and meals were sent to our room as we were not fully vaccinated yet. Food tasted great and hotel was very accomodating for us to replace desserts for appetisers. 2 course meal for lunch and 3 course meal for dinner with soft drinks provided too. Impeccable service and cosy ambience in hotel. Highly recommended!

Our second time at this resort. The staffs are friendly and attentive as usual. Even though the pool area is under maintenance now but we were given access to villa pool or Spa Pool as other alternatives. Due to the heightened alert, no full dining menu was available but the selection is still good. We will be back for third time
Old room, not clean, food is average.

With face mask and physical barrier at check in counter, the loud music is really not helping as we can't hear each other. It didn't lighten the ambience or calm the waiting customers. It should be a rule that a reception counter at restaurant should never be left unattended. Patrons should never have to walk into the restaurant to get attention. The receptionist walked away to attend to other things in the restaurant means she is multitasking. Need to review your manpower allocation.

6-Star Hotel! Really amazing ambience. Smooth check-in (don't forget to ask for the welcome drink coupon if the staff forgets). Comfortable quiet room. Shower that is powerful and has adjustable warm water. Welcome pack of hand sanitizer, antiseptic wipes etc. Really yummy food for Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner - you can just stay in the hotel the whole day. KweeZeen for Breakfast & Lunch. The Cliff for Dinner. Would come back!
Felt like we were overseas in a beach resort !

At the check in, I asked if I need to book for breakfast and they said no and that I can go anytime. The next day, when I went to the restaurant at 10am, they refused to let me in and told me that they have a function starting at 11:30am. Imagine my family and my little baby who are hungry. I had to complain to the reception and ask them to talk to their manager and they proposed to have in room dining which is not ideal when you have a baby of 16 months; the whole room was dirty with food after the meal. Also, during dinner time, a man and his son was walking around the restaurant without wearing a mask and the staff was just smiling at them without asking to wear a mask and I complained to the waiter. The next day again, a boy who is older than 6 is walking around in the reception area without a mask and nobody told him to wear a mask. Lastly, I think some of the staffs have Pinkerton syndrome. I walked to the restaurant and the waiter mumbled something which I didn’t understand and start to attend to an Ang moh man behind me. I replied “Excuse me, what did you say?” Then only he attended to me. Because of all these, my wife had a bad Mother’s Day.

We opted for the Infinite Package where all three meals were provided for our 3D2N stay. The staycation was the closest to feeling like we were overseas. However, we were underwhelmed by the standards from a luxury 5 star hotel. Pros: + Away from city, quite relaxing + Relatively bigger rooms than what you get from most hotels in the city + The package with all meals provided was great because we did not have to worry about what or where to eat. We had breakfast/lunch at Kwee Zeen and lunch/dinner at The Cliff. Buffet breakfast spread was decent. Lunch portion at Kwee Zeen was generous, and our favourite restaurant got to be The Cliff - good view and good food! Cons: - The room is quite dirty, it was the worse 5 star hotel I have been to in this respect. Coffee machine was really dirty, HDMI /USD plug on the wall was sticky for don't know what reason, the mini bar table had so much coffee stain we had to clean it ourselves, one of our towels even had hair in it. If you lift the blanket, you could see dirty yellow matches. A part of me was glad I only saw it a few hours before checking out... - Restaurants were understaffed. While staff tried their best, service from a luxury 5 star was compromised. Was expecting it to be more well managed noting that it is really not a surprise that the restaurants would be packed during peak hours. - The pool was really dirty. Our eyes felt slightly irritated the first time we had a dip. When we went into the pool in our goggles, gosh it was quite murky. - Gym was well equipped and there is hardly anyone inside. With that said, thought it would have been better if they provide clean towels for people to wipe down the equipment after they are done with it in Covid times. There was a dirty looking green towel lying around. - Sent them an email a couple of days before our staycay and it appeared that it went into a black hole even after sending a chaser. Had to call them many times before someone finally picked up. It was really disappointing that standards did not match up to the price tag we paid for a luxury 5 star hotel. Otherwise, it would have been a perfect stay.

Definitely not 5-stars hotel service! Overall food was quite bad, not satisfying at all! Check in late but can't check out late! Pool seats/cushions were not well-maintained, quite dirty! Would not recommend anyone to stay here!
It was a really good staycay! Spacious clean room to fit 3 of us. Eric from the reception was fast, efficient and really friendly. Really appreciate his help!
Don’t understand why need to charged my lunch for my last stay. Why chicken rice set was not in the menu? Thought chicken rice, laksa, Bak Gu teh etc together inside the menu
Lovely grounds, clean room. Went on a weekday and there was no queue at either check in or check out. Food at The Garden was great! The Cliff was good as well but desserts weren’t their strong suit
Thoroughly enjoyed the stay - excellent service and facilities. Purchased the infinite experience package and it was really worth it as all meals were included. Will definitely visit again!

The environment and ambience was very relaxing and there are a lot of nature around it. The pool is huge however it’s not very clean. There base of the pool is dirty and there are powdery particles. The food and service is fine. It will be better to go for breakfast at an earlier timing, about 8am to avoid the long queue.

It was really a resort feel, away from the hustle and bustle of city life. Great service. Great food. Great pool. Great ambience. Furniture and fixtures were a little dated but good enough for a comfortable stay. Asked for a quiet corner and was given a garden view. Jason from The Cliff restaurant made some good recommendations.

Booked this staycation for my 2nd wedding anniversary and was rather disappointed by the overall experience. While the place is gorgeous and food/service at the restaurant (The Cliff) was good, we found the place a little old and not well-maintained. The aisles to the rooms were dirty and smoking area was left uncleaned (we don’t smoke but we saw the dedicated area was filled with cigarettes, empty potato chips bag left there since we checked in at 3pm till we came back from dinner at 9pm) and when we were in the room at 3/4pm, it was very noisy like there were works above our room. When we came back from our swim, we found a huge sofa right outside our room door and was only removed after 1-2 hours. The service was ok but it felt rather rushed, and the entire place felt understaffed. When asked for extra body soap for the bath tub over the phone, however they provided bar soap instead. Have also requested for early check in and late check out but understand that it was subject to availability, but seems like the staff doesn’t check on the requests stated in our travel voucher and has to be repeated to them on the spot. I guess it will not be a repeat stay, but nonetheless was a rather ok getaway from the city.
No welcome drinks, and they not send me to my room, I walk to my room alone, and find by my self, without explanation about my room and everything.
the bed and the room very humid.
One of the great hotels in Sentosa.
It is good experience to stay there.
Perfect but when I come to my room (Junior Suite), found dirty balcony

Pros: Free shuttle, free entrance back to Sentosa by car, Sightings of peacocks Cons: Room doesn't feel spacious We checked in and requested an extra bed, confirmed at around 3pm but it was still not there when we came back at 6pm. Aircon was not cold so we called for repair but waited for more than half an hour before anyone came. Remote could not function properly. We were told that nobody stayed there before us maybe that's why its not maintained as well.
I think the whole service with mediocre standards as other hotel2, thank
